channel.title: Problems on Yolan Romailler
channel.description: Recent content in Problems on Yolan Romailler

item.title: A strange ODBC driver problem
item.description: This is a post meant to be found on Google by people having the same problem, hopefully this will save them some time. ODBC Drivers I spent at least 6 hours knocking my head out because of some strange error the Qt OBDC driver was giving me when trying to access an Access Database file .accdb : Could not find installable ISAM. What a strange problem! After playing a bit more with ODBC I also got a new error:

item.title: A strange QSql Driver error
item.description: This is a post meant to be found on Google by people having the same problem, hopefully this will save them some time. QSql Drivers I spent at least 3 hours playing with QSql drivers, source code, DLLs and googling around in order to get rid of an annoying error : After recompiling the qmysql drivers, therefore reinstalling MySQL & going through the pain of installing MS Visual Studio because it looked like Qt needed it to compile its qmysql driver (while it actually doesn’t ; you can compile it using MinGW) I was finally able to tackle the problem!

item.title: A ladder, a box and a wall
